page.title: 18VILLAGE STUDY, GROESFAEN
page.content: {LANDSCAPE/BUILDINGS:}An old site but no ancient buildings visible. Located 3 miles S.E. Talbot Green on Llantrisant/Cardiff Rd. where N./S. road crosses. Has parish church, chapel, pub, P.O./shop, half hourly bus service, 1 P.O. phone and post box. {SHAPE:}Linear being stretched for half mile from crossroads in E. to detached houses beyond speed limit. Buildings both sides of road but two new estates on N. side only. {FUNCTION:}Facilities are basic, no jobs locally for residents thus is a typical commuter village, part of Greater Cardiff commuter zone, and is a{"sought after"}area. {GADAIR WEN HOUSE:}To S. of village Victorian/Edwardian residence now being renovated for M.P./M.E.P. landowner Sir Brandon Rhys Williams.
